channel.title: Ok, need to know a few things here. thanks
channel.description:
ok so im using United Pk source, which rocks. but i cant seem to see the co-ords on the run icon like it usually is on most servers, so can anyone tell me where it is on United Pk
another thing is, how do i change the exp givin by statues and stuff.. like the exp is a bit low.. i wanna crank it up[br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 10:50:29 AM[/size][hr]oh and also, how do i change areas from safezones to wild zones
and also this is the last thing, how do i make like places like
shop/heroes guild and i could most likely add the shops but not whats in them lol, so how would i put items in the shop.\
Regards ~Blain[br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 10:52:17 AM[/size][hr]come on people i know some of you know these things
